The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#14740](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/14740.html) (docs: Update rpcbind doc to match the manpa

ACK fa0119af226255ce1e0e573a575ab37539ff8693

> Concept ACK fa0119a

I don't understand, why would you concept ACK a one-line documentation change instead of just ACKing?

This is true for all options, really, I've sometimes wondered if we shouldn't generate the example configuration somehow  (do people prefer this inline style to manpages?) instead of having a separate place with options documentation here.
